subject: Fwd: Re: [junit] Re: How to test private member variables?
msgSnippet: ... due ... command ... args ... member ... some ... provide ... very ... for me to do this last night. I ll try again today. :) ... I have read the
messageBody:

wrote:
>

due

command

args
> >>to a builder. Second is to use the builder to set the private
member
> >>variables. I could understand the first step to use equivalent
> >>operation to compare two builder class objects. However, I have
some
> >>sort of difficult to understand the Second step. Could you
provide
> >>some code snippets to give more concrete explanations? Thanks
very
> >>much!
> >
> >I will take some time to write this up on my JUnit blog tonight.

for me to do this last night. I'll try again today. :)
